name: Cubology
description:
Currently 'Pay Want You Want' : D

This was my 2nd indie game. Started off as 3D Tetris, ended up as a block-pushing puzzle game. There was a built-in editor and some nice folk sent in their levels, which are still in the game (unlike the editor). Also, check out the animated robot ... programming skills or what!? ; )

The Mars Mining Colony has been in operation for over 100 years. The success of this outpost has been unprecedented, but this may be about to change. Unfortunately, the years have not been kind to our sorting droid (Model 1-2ac), also known as I-ZAC. We require you to assist in the sorting operation until I-ZAC can be fully restored to operational capacity.

Clear incoming mineral cubes in the hectic arcade mode or solve blocked up levels in the puzzle mode. Group mineral cubes together and form layers of gem cubes for multiplier bonuses. The puzzle mode also features Bomb, Spray, Teleporter, Absorber and Clone cubes to help keep you on your toes.
